name: Zombeats (adolfozt)
description:
The objective is to escape the dungeon full of zombies.

Credits:

  • Game: Adolfo Zarrias "Nanashi no Gombe"
  • Music: Victor Martinez "Victormame"
  • Thaleah fat font: Tiny Worlds
  • Minifantasy dungeon: Krishna Palacio

Controls:

ActionDesktopAndroidChoose direction
Right arrow keyTap on right sideMove (must be in sync with the beat)
Left arrow keyTap on left side

Note: there seems to be an issue with the synchronicity of gameplay and music that vary between devices. It seems that the most stable version is the windows build.
